field.name: ma_cd
field.check: exists(select 1 from @@table b where @@table.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh and @@table.ma_cd = b.ma_cd having count(b.stt) > 1)

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt where loai_vt in ('41', '51'))

field.name: ma_ccv
field.check: loai_cd = '3' and ma_ccv <> ''⩓loai_cd <> '3' and ma_ccv not in (select ma_ccv from sfdmcumcv)

field.name: ma_cm
field.check: ma_cm <> '' and ma_cm not in (select ma_cm from sfdmcummay)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: loai_cd = '3' and (ma_kh <> '' and ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh))⩓loai_cd <> '3' and ma_kh <> ''

field.name: td_chuyen
field.check: (dung_kt = 1 or nk_yn = 1) and td_chuyen = 1 ⩓ td_chuyen <> '' and td_chuyen not in ('0', '1')

field.name: dung_kt
field.check: (td_chuyen = 1 or nk_yn = 1) and dung_kt = 1 ⩓ dung_kt <> '' and dung_kt not in ('0', '1')

field.name: nk_yn
field.check: (td_chuyen = 1 or dung_kt = 1) and nk_yn = 1 ⩓ nk_yn <> '' and nk_yn not in ('0', '1')

text.v: Khai báo quy trình sản xuất

processing.text: declare @q nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1), @datetime0 datetime, @irregularChars varchar(128), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000) declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @i int, @k int, @currentID int, @count int, @voucherID varchar(8), @message nvarchar(4000) select @irregularChars = &IrregularValue; select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell đã có hoặc lồng nhau.' else 'The value of cell %invalidCell is invalid or already exists.' end alter table @@table alter column ma_lo_trinh char(32) create index i on @@table (ma_lo_trinh) select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @i = 1, @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @voucherID = 'SF3', @datetime0 = getdate() -- Update update @@table set dvt = b.dvt from @@table a join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt where a.dvt = '' -- Check &Checking; if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'dvt', stt, '00001' from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null &w1;'dvt'&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_lo_trinh', stt, @message from @@table where ma_lo_trinh like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_cd', stt, @message from @@table where ma_cd like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'cd_truoc', stt, '00002' from @@table a where cd_truoc <> '' and cd_truoc not in (select ma_cd from @@table b where a.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh and b.stt < a.stt) &w1;'cd_truoc'&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; group by ma_lo_trinh, stt &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'cd_sau', stt, '00002' from @@table a where cd_sau <> '' and cd_sau not in (select ma_cd from @@table b where a.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh and b.stt > a.stt) &w1;'cd_sau'&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; group by ma_lo_trinh, stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'dvt', @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null&Error; select @field = 'ma_lo_trinh', @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_lo_trinh like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; select @field = 'ma_cd', @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_cd like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; select @field = 'cd_truoc', @r = min(stt) from @@table a where cd_truoc <> '' and cd_truoc not in (select ma_cd from @@table b where a.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh and b.stt < a.stt) group by ma_lo_trinh &Error; select @field = 'cd_sau', @r = min(stt) from @@table a where cd_sau <> '' and cd_sau not in (select ma_cd from @@table b where a.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh and b.stt > a.stt) group by ma_lo_trinh &Error; end if @admin <> 1 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'CRRoutingMaintenance', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from phrt b where a.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh) select a.*, b.stt_rec into #k from @@table a join phrt b on a.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh) -- Checking select @field = 'ma_lo_trinh' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from @@table a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_lo_trinh <> b.ma_lo_trinh and a.ma_lo_trinh like rtrim(b.ma_lo_trinh) + ''%'' &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from @@table a, phrt b with (index(PK_phrt)) where a.ma_lo_trinh like rtrim(b.ma_lo_trinh) + ''%'' &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, b.stt, ''00003'' from phrt a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_lo_trinh like rtrim(b.ma_lo_trinh) + ''%'' &w1;@field&w2;b.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by b.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @q = 'select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_lo_trinh <> b.ma_lo_trinh and a.ma_lo_trinh like rtrim(b.ma_lo_trinh) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, phrt b with (index(PK_phrt)) where a.ma_lo_trinh like rtrim(b.ma_lo_trinh) + '%'&Duplicate; select @q = 'select top 1 @r = b.stt from phrt a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_lo_trinh like rtrim(b.ma_lo_trinh) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; end &EndErrorMode; if @type = '1' begin declare @changeField nvarchar(64), @changeFieldMsg nvarchar(4000), @recCode char(13), @routingCode varchar(32) select top 1 @routingCode = a.ma_lo_trinh, @r = b.stt from ctrt a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where a.ma_vt2 <> '' if @routingCode is not null begin select @message = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Quy trình sản xuất %s đã có nhập bán thành phẩm cộng thêm, không thể chép đè được.' else N'The routing %s has been included the extra WIP, it could not be overwritten.' end select replace(@message, '%s', @routingCode) as message, 'ma_lo_trinh' as field, @r as record return end select a.* into #importdetail from #k a where exists(select 1 from cs2$000000 b where b.ma_lo_trinh = a.ma_lo_trinh) select @r = min(stt) from #importdetail while @r is not null begin select @recCode = stt_rec, @routingCode = ma_lo_trinh from #importdetail where stt = @r exec AI_ERP$Voucher$CheckFieldChange @recCode, @voucherID, '', '', @@language, @changeField out, @changeFieldMsg out, 'bang_tc = ''#importdetail''' if @changeFieldMsg <> '' begin select @message = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Quy trình sản xuất %s: ' else N'The routing %s: ' end + @changeFieldMsg select replace(@message, '%s', @routingCode) as message, 'ma_lo_trinh' as field, @r as record return end select @r = min(stt) from #importdetail where stt > @r and stt_rec <> @recCode end end select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ma_lo_trinh, ma_cd, ten_cd, ten_cd2, kieu_cd, cd_truoc, cd_sau, ma_vt, loai_cd, ma_ccv, ma_cm, dvt, tg_bd_cds, sl_bd_cds, tg_cho, tg_cai_dat, sl_may, nang_suat, cach_tinh, tg_vs, tg_chuyen, nc_cai_dat, nc_th, cc_sd, ma_kh, tg_gc, cp_gc, tl_kt, tl_kt2, tru_dm, td_chuyen, dung_kt, td_phi, nhap_sl, nk_yn, xk_yn into #d1 from ctrt select @count = count(*) from @@table if @count > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_lo_trinh, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id1 from phrt insert into #id1(stt_rec, ma_lo_trinh, stt) select '', ma_lo_trinh, min(stt) from @@table group by ma_lo_trinh select @k = count(*) from #id1 select @currentID = stt_rec from dmstt update dmstt set stt_rec = stt_rec + @count update #id1 set stt_rec = @wsID + replace(str(id + rtrim(@currentID) , 9), ' ', '0') + @voucherID insert into #d1 select b.stt_rec, replace(str((a.stt - b.stt) + 1, 3), ' ', '0'), (a.stt - b.stt) + 1, a.ma_lo_trinh, a.ma_cd, a.ten_cd, a.ten_cd2, a.kieu_cd, a.cd_truoc, a.cd_sau, a.ma_vt, a.loai_cd, a.ma_ccv, a.ma_cm, a.dvt, a.tg_bd_cds, a.sl_bd_cds, a.tg_cho, a.tg_cai_dat, a.sl_may, a.nang_suat, a.cach_tinh, a.tg_vs, a.tg_chuyen, a.nc_cai_dat, a.nc_th, a.cc_sd, a.ma_kh, a.tg_gc, a.cp_gc, a.tl_kt, a.tl_kt2, a.tru_dm, a.td_chuyen, a.dung_kt, a.td_phi, a.nhap_sl, a.nk_yn, a.xk_yn from @@table a join #id1 b on a.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh order by a.ma_lo_trinh, a.stt select top 0 stt_rec, ma_lo_trinh, ten_lo_trinh, ten_lo_trinh2 into #m1 from phrt insert into #m1 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_lo_trinh, a.ten_lo_trinh, a.ten_lo_trinh2 from @@table a join #id1 b on a.stt = b.stt select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, c$, m$, d$, ma_lo_trinh, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i1 from irt insert into #i1 select a.stt_rec, null, '', '', rtrim(a.ma_lo_trinh) + a.stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(a.ma_lo_trinh), '', a.ma_lo_trinh, a.stt from #id1 a join @@table b on a.stt = b.stt select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i1', '#d1', 'd$', 'ma_cd, ma_vt', '#10$, #20$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert @@inserting(master); @@inserting(detail); @@inserting(inquiry); &AfterUpdate; end if @type = '1' begin select @k = count(*) from #k if @k > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_lo_trinh, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id2 from phrt insert into #id2 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_lo_trinh, min(a.stt) from #k a join phrt b on a.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh group by a.ma_lo_trinh, b.stt_rec select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ma_lo_trinh, ma_cd, ten_cd, ten_cd2, kieu_cd, cd_truoc, cd_sau, ma_vt, loai_cd, ma_ccv, ma_cm, dvt, tg_bd_cds, sl_bd_cds, tg_cho, tg_cai_dat, sl_may, nang_suat, cach_tinh, tg_vs, tg_chuyen, nc_cai_dat, nc_th, cc_sd, ma_kh, tg_gc, cp_gc, tl_kt, tl_kt2, tru_dm, td_chuyen, dung_kt, td_phi, nhap_sl, nk_yn, xk_yn into #d2 from ctrt insert into #d2 select b.stt_rec, replace(str((a.stt - b.stt) + 1, 3), ' ', '0'), (a.stt - b.stt) + 1, a.ma_lo_trinh, a.ma_cd, a.ten_cd, a.ten_cd2, a.kieu_cd, a.cd_truoc, a.cd_sau, a.ma_vt, a.loai_cd, a.ma_ccv, a.ma_cm, a.dvt, a.tg_bd_cds, a.sl_bd_cds, a.tg_cho, a.tg_cai_dat, a.sl_may, a.nang_suat, a.cach_tinh, a.tg_vs, a.tg_chuyen, a.nc_cai_dat, a.nc_th, a.cc_sd, a.ma_kh, a.tg_gc, a.cp_gc, a.tl_kt, a.tl_kt2, a.tru_dm, a.td_chuyen, a.dung_kt, a.td_phi, a.nhap_sl, a.nk_yn, a.xk_yn from #k a join #id2 b on a.ma_lo_trinh = b.ma_lo_trinh order by a.ma_lo_trinh, a.stt select top 0 stt_rec, ma_lo_trinh, ten_lo_trinh, ten_lo_trinh2 into #m2 from phrt insert into #m2 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_lo_trinh, a.ten_lo_trinh, a.ten_lo_trinh2 from #k a join #id2 b on a.stt = b.stt select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, c$, m$, d$, ma_lo_trinh, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i2 from irt insert into #i2 select a.stt_rec, null, '', '', rtrim(a.ma_lo_trinh) + a.stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(a.ma_lo_trinh), '', a.ma_lo_trinh, a.stt from #id2 a join #k b on a.stt = b.stt select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i2', '#d2', 'd$', 'ma_cd, ma_vt', '#10$, #20$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Update update phrt set @@list(master); from phrt a join #m2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec delete ctrt where stt_rec in (select distinct stt_rec from #id2) truncate table #d1 insert into #d1 select * from #d2 @@inserting(detail); update irt set @@list(inquiry); from irt a join #i2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec &AfterUpdate; end end
